title: A Virtual Patient Simulator in the Context of Calcium and Phosphate Homeostasis
text: thank RStudio providing us RStudio Connect licences. illustration backgrounds designed Tara Von Grebel animations produced Janine Meyer, Multimedia eLearning-Services, University Zurich.

title: CaPO4Sim — CaPO4Sim
text: Explore calcium (Ca) phosphate (Pi) homeostasis two novel 'Shiny' apps, building upon previously published mathematical model written C, ensure efficient computations. underlying model accessible <https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/28747359>. first application explores fundamentals Ca-Pi homeostasis, second provides interactive case studies -depth exploration topic, thereby seeking foster student engagement integrative understanding Ca-Pi regulation. applications hosted <https://rinterface.com/AppsPhysiol.html>.

title: CaPO4 Edges Generator — generate_edges
text: components Shiny input CaPO4 component selector. See networkOptions. organs Shiny input toggle organs display. See networkOptions. regulations Shiny input toggle hormone display. See networkOptions. diseases Shiny input disease selector. See diseaseSelect. organs_edges_size Shiny input organs edges size. See networkOptions. hormones_edges_size Shiny input hormones edges size. See networkOptions.

CaPO4 Network Generator — generate_network
text: nodes dataframe nodes provided generate_nodes. edges dataframe edges provided generate_edges. usephysics Whether use physic. FALSE default. visNetwork API parameter. isMobile Shiny input checking app running cellphone/tablet.

title: carousel container — myCarousel
text: Creates carousel. Adapted shinydashboardplus also allow control carousel animation

title: carousel container — myCarousel
code: myCarousel(   ...,   id,   indicators = TRUE,   width = 6,   .list = NULL,   data.interval = 5000,   data.ride = "carousel" )

title: carousel container — myCarousel
text: ... Slot carouselItem id Carousel id. Must unique. indicators Whether display left right indicators. width Carousel width. 6 default. .list need pass carouselItem via lapply similar, put item instead passing ... data.interval specify data-interval ms. 5000ms default, set "false" prevent automated animation slides. data.ride specify data-ride. "carousel" default.

title: CaPO4 Network server module — networkCaPO4
text: input Shiny inputs output Shiny Outputs session Session object. isMobile Shiny input checking app running cellphone/tablet. components Shiny input CaPO4 component selector. See networkOptions. organs Shiny input toggle organs display. See networkOptions. regulations Shiny input toggle hormone display. See networkOptions. background Shiny input background selector. See networkOptions. diseases Shiny input disease selector. See diseaseSelect. organs_nodes_size Shiny input organs node size. See networkOptions. hormones_nodes_size Shiny input hormones node size. See networkOptions. organs_edges_size Shiny input organs edges size. See networkOptions. hormones_edges_size Shiny input hormones edges size. See networkOptions. help Help input.
